data.question: What is the empirical formula of the compound Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) referred to as 1?
What change in color is observed when Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) undergoes a ligand-centered solid-state reduction?
data.answer: The color changes from dark green to dark purple.

data.question: What is the increase in magnetic coupling strength upon ligand-centered solid-state reduction of Mn(N,O)L(DMSO)?
data.answer: The magnetic coupling strength increases nearly 40-fold, from J = -0.38(1) to -15.6(2) cm−1.

data.question: What is the effect of ligand-centered solid-state reduction on the electronic conductivity of Mn(N,O)L(DMSO)?
data.answer: The electronic conductivity increases 10,000-fold, from σ = 2.33(1) × 10−12 S/cm to 8.61(1) × 10−8 S/cm.

data.question: How does the activation energy for electron conduction change upon reduction of Mn(N,O)L(DMSO)?
data.answer: The thermal activation energy for electron conduction decreases from Ea = 0.64(1) eV to 0.39(1) eV.

data.question: What is the effect of soaking Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) in a solution of Cp2Co?
data.answer: Soaking in a solution of Cp2Co results in a ligand-centered solid-state reduction to [Mn(N,O)L]−, changing the color from dark green to dark purple.

data.question: What happens to Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) when treated with [Cp2Fe]+?
data.answer: Treatment with [Cp2Fe]+ regenerates the oxidized chain, reversing the reduction process.

data.question: Is the redox process of Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) ligand-centered?
Does the reduction of Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) result in a decrease in magnetic coupling strength?
Is the electronic conductivity of Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) higher after reduction?
Does the thermal activation energy for electron conduction increase upon reduction of Mn(N,O)L(DMSO)?
Can the redox process of Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) be reversed by soaking in a solution of [Cp2Fe]+?
Is the redox chemistry associated with Mn(N,O)L(DMSO) and its reduced form Mn-based?
